Package Framework

Includes everything needed to make a game
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Ability
    An Ability object which can be attached to an Npc or Player
    Ability.Builder
    Inner class to create an Ability object
    Game
    Game object singleton class
    Menu
    A Menu object which is created by the user
    Menu.Builder
    Inner class to create a Menu object
    Npc
    An Npc object
    Npc.Builder
    Inner class to create an Npc object
    NpcMovement
    An NpcMovement object which can be added to an Npc
    NpcMovement.Builder
    Inner class to create an NpcMovement object
    Player
    A Player object which is controlled by the user
    Player.Builder
    Inner class to create a Player object
    Sprite
    A Sprite object
    Weapon
    A Weapon object which can be given to an Npc or Player
    Weapon.Builder
    Inner class to create a Weapon object
